source.name: Exercise 5
source.instructions: Repeat Exercise 3, except code the new stored procedure, named spGetItemsCat, with an input argument that receives a VARCHAR argument to be compared with the values in the category field and that returns output for the rows/records whose category value matches the argument sent to the stored procedure. Again, output the results in ascending order of the id field.
